data.text: @lisamdanish Yeah I understand that, too. Especially now that masks and tests are being phased out. They’ll still have access…
@ShannonSkalos Gotcha totally fair. I see that and just want to scream cause why do they get to be safer than us?
@lisamdanish I understand all that. I just mean that my brain makes me cringe now. I hate what COVID has done to me!
@ShannonSkalos Because they probably have been so carefully protected, everyone around them masking and getting tested before this meeting. They're not taking a risk, they're just privileged.

@ShannonSkalos Most people are fine with the risks 

They are minimal
@ShannonSkalos 😆 Yep I totally get that. It's kind of just a part of life now. I don't even think about it. Just slap one on before going in anyplace.
